summary: Despite marital problems, English Lord Albert Esketh and his rich American socialite wife Lady Edwina Esketh travel to India to buy a prize horse from the ruler of Ranchipur.
cast: Lana Turner|Richard Burton|Fred MacMurray|Joan Caulfield|Michael Rennie|Eugenie Leontovich|Gladys Hurlbut|Madge Kennedy|Carlo Rizzo|Beatrice Kraft|Rama Bai|John Banner|Jugat Bhatia|George Brand|Argentina Brunetti|King Calder|Jack Deery|Paul Frees|Naji Gabbay|Ivis Goulding|Bhupesh Guha|Sam Harris|Yalhiraji Iyengar|Kan Thi Iyenger|Phyllis Johannes|Kay Koury|Lou Krugman|Pasupah Murkerjee|Elizabeth Prudhomme|Ramchandra|Bhogwan Singh|Aly Wassil|Trude Wyler
title: Las lluvias de Ranchipur
